author: bridge-bot
content: <Benewagner> Info: as already mentioned last week, we moved the hash sig repo to the leanEthereum org. The old repo still exists (so that the references to it remain valid, e.g., in the academic paper) but will no longer be maintained. All optimizations and changes that we make from now will be in the new one under leanEthereum. It is here (https://github.com/leanEthereum/leanSig). You can now also update all references that you have to point to this instead the b-wagn one.

author: bridge-bot
content: <corcoranwill> Hi All. Due to lots of people being at Devconnect we are going to cancel the PQ Interop call this Wed.  Thanks
